thread.section_title: Choosetexaspower Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Choosetexaspower | choosetexaspower.org | 2 of 20
thread.title: Carol Plumb

author: Carol Plumb
title: Carol Plumb
text:
After having an excellent experience with this website and rep last year, I decided to try it again this year when my 12 month plan was up. The text session was good and when I called they had all my info I had submitted over the text chat.
I have sucessfully changed my electric service for the next 24 months. Looking forward to more excellent service from my new electric provider at a better rate.
